Text:
I have to say THANKYOU!!

     I am a huge fan of Tintin as well as Asterix and obilisk. I have all the comics and actuallym have all the Tintin movies but they are of a bad quaility. I sure hope you can upload all of them as yours are sweet!

           Thanks Silk
yes, i have all of them.  glad the u like the quality! thnx for the feedback!
Excellent quality ... many thanks, my grandchildren (5yr & 7yr) love Tintin.

These Tintin are the best upload I've seen in a while!
Cheers heaps, sani .
